attributes.description: Identifier of model or schema used to create the content.
attributes.name: item_type

attributes.description: Version of model or schema used to create the content item.
attributes.name: item_type_version

attributes.description: Reference to a demographic entity elsewhere in this Extract representing the author of the item version. The reference should be a UID corresponding to the UID of a `GENERIC_CONTENT_ITEM` containing the demographic information.
attributes.name: author

attributes.description: Time of creation of this item version on the original system. This may be an earlier commit time, or it may be the time at which the item was created during the Extract generation process.
attributes.name: creation_time

attributes.description: Reference to a demographic entity elsewhere in this Extract representing an authoriser of the item version, if relevant. The reference should be a UID corresponding to the UID of a `GENERIC_CONTENT_ITEM` containing the demographic information.
attributes.name: authoriser

attributes.description: Time of authorisation of this item version on the original system where relevant.
attributes.name: authorisation_time

attributes.description: Coded lifecycle status of the item.
attributes.name: item_status

attributes.description: Version id of this item in original system.
attributes.name: version_id

attributes.description: Version set id of this item in original system, where applicable.
attributes.name: version_set_id

attributes.description: Identifier of EMR or other system from which the item was created / extracted. Typically in the form of a domain name.
attributes.name: system_id

attributes.description: Other details about the content item.
attributes.name: other_details

meta_info.description: Single item in generic extract, designed for 13606 and CDA data.
meta_info.name: GENERIC_CONTENT_ITEM
